---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an enhancement or addition to the JSON Schema
labels: enhancement
---

## Describe your use case

Please explain the business or technical need for this feature.

## Example(s)

Provide specific data examples that illustrate your need.

## Proposed schema change

What addition, change, or amendment do you suggest?

## Optional or mandatory?

- [ ] This should be an optional extension.
- [ ] This should be required for all users.

## Impact

How would this affect existing users of the schema?

## Related standards or references

If relevant, reference a standard or protocol this relates to.

## Additional information

Add any other context or information here.
